data: Prof. Junko Shigemitsu Prof. Junko Shigemitsu Prof. Junko Shigemitsu Emerita Professor shigemitsu.1@osu.edu 614-292-1786 Physics Research Building, M2034 Lattice Guage Theory Non perturbative approaches to strong interactions Heavy quark physics Ph.D. - Physics - Cornell University - 1978 B.S. - Physics - Sophia University Tokyo, Japan - 1973 Brief CV: http://www.physics.ohio-state.edu/briefcvs/shigemitsu_briefcv.pdf Fellow of the American Physical Society OSU Distinguished Scholar Award 2011
